Description

AddWaterMarkToPdfController class for handling requests to add watermarks to PDF files.

Configuration class for setting up asynchronous execution with a custom thread pool.

Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing the response for authentication requests.

Implementation of the AuthService interface responsible for handling authentication and token management.

A utility class that contains constant values used throughout the application.
